statements: DELETE FROM land_use_changes WHERE area_name = 'City A' AND years_active > 5;
DELETE FROM land_use_changes WHERE area_name = 'Riverside' AND years_active > 10;
DELETE FROM LandUseHistory WHERE area_name = 'City Center' AND year = '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM LandUseCategories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM land_use_changes WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM land_use_changes WHERE land_use_type = 'Residential' AND area > 100;
DELETE FROM City WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles';
